text: Discussing how and why certain groups of people were selected to receive the #vaccine first during today's #COVID19 Vaccine Series. Our thanks to panelists: #RSC Fellow @DrCChambers, Members of #RSC Task Forces @kwame_mckenzie & Dr. Sharon Straus and Dr. Danièle Behn Smith. https://t.co/v8oAQ7l5Jx
